thumb.title: 煩悩即菩提 ２
thumb.description: [Verse 1] 欲望が燃える、心が叫ぶよ Bonnou ga moeru, kokoro ga sakebu yo I’m drownin’ in this fire, can’t find my way 夜が深いほど、闇が俺を呼ぶ Yoru ga fukai hodo, yami ga ore o yobu [Chorus] 煩悩即菩提, that’s what they say Bonnou soku bodai, kikoeru koe 欲望も悟りも、同じ道の上 Yoku mo satori mo, onaji michi no ue Oh, this troubled soul, finds peace someday Yeah, 煩悩即菩提, in the blues I play [Verse 2] 酒と涙で、夜を塗り潰す Sake to namida de, yoru o nuritsubusu Got a bottle in my hand, and a heart that’s torn 苦しみの果てに、光が見えるか Kurushimi no hate ni, hikari ga mieru ka Singin’ through the pain, ‘til a new dawn’s born [Chorus] 煩悩即菩提, that’s what they say Bonnou soku bodai, kikoeru koe 欲望も悟りも、同じ道の上 Yoku mo satori mo, onaji michi no ue Oh, this troubled soul, finds peace someday Yeah, 煩悩即菩提, in the blues I play [Bridge] ギターが泣いて、魂が震える Guitar ga naite, tamashii ga furueru Every note I play, cuts through the night 煩悩を抱えて、菩提に手を伸ばす Bonnou o kakaete, bodai ni te o nobasu In this endless fight, I’m searchin’ for the light [Outro] 煩悩即菩提, sing it low and slow Bonnou soku bodai, koe o hisomete 欲望も悟りも、ブルースの中さ Yoku mo satori mo, blues no naka sa Oh, I’ll keep on playin’, ‘til the truth I know Yeah, 煩悩即菩提, my soul’s final show
